biotools.summary:
Web Services, Tools and Databases for Exploring Human microRNA Data.

The Chair for Clinical Bioinformatics at Saarland University has developed numerous tools to aid microRNA researchers. HumiR is here to match you with the perfect tool for all your miRNA analysis needs.
